Learn how to migrate from Nuxt 2 to Nuxt Bridge new plugins and middleware.
You can now migrate to the Nuxt 3 plugins API, which is slightly different in format from Nuxt 2.
Plugins now take only one argument (
). You can find out more in
language-js shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme-lighter material-theme-palenight
If you want to use the new Nuxt composables (such as
) within your plugins, you will need to use the
Although a compatibility interface is provided via
you should avoid registering plugins, directives, mixins or components this way without adding your own logic to ensure they are not installed more than once, or this may cause a memory leak.
You can now migrate to the Nuxt 3 middleware API, which is slightly different in format from Nuxt 2.
Middleware now take only two argument (
language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme-lighter material-theme-palenight twoslash lsp
Percentage encoded pathname section of the URL.
is not supported outside of the middleware directory.
You can be enabled with the
language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme-lighter material-theme-palenight

Learn how to migrate to Composition API with Nuxt Bridge.
Nuxt Bridge implements composables compatible with Nuxt 3.
